channel.title: Comments on: Portishead talks smack about trendy producer Mark Ronson

item.title: By: Mark Ronson responds to Portishead dis
item.dc:creator: Mark Ronson responds to Portishead dis
item.description: [...] been so catty lately. In all fairness Portishead’s Geoff Barrow took the first shot, completely unprovoked. And now producer Mark Ronson has responded in kind, albeit somewhat more [...]
item.content:encoded: […] been so catty lately. In all fairness Portishead’s Geoff Barrow took the first shot, completely unprovoked. And now producer Mark Ronson has responded in kind, albeit somewhat more […]
